title: Beats by Dre | Sound Symposium China: Highlight
description: Beats by Dre gathered the China's music industry insiders to discuss one of the most often overlooked elements of the industry: Sound. Watch JJ Lin, Michael Au,  Billy Koh in conversation with Beats President Luke Wood, featuring exclusive live performance brought by JJ Lin.

asset.title: Beats by Dre | Sound Symposium China: Highlight
asset.description:
Beats by Dre gathered the China's music industry insiders to discuss one of the most often overlooked elements of the industry: Sound. Watch JJ Lin (林俊傑), Michael Au (歐丁玉),  Billy Koh (許環梁) in conversation with Beats President Luke Wood, featuring exclusive live performance brought by JJ Lin.

=========================================

Beats by Dre

asset.author: Beats by Dre

transcripts: What we're going to do tonight is we're going to talk about sound and how sound is related to emotion. I hope that when people listen to my songs they can feel the same emotions that I felt when I was creating this music. If I can feel the music, then I'm sure  listeners will feel it too. [Music Playing]
